item.title: Administrative Agreement Integration and Improvement of Modification and Termination System
item.description: Tianhao Chen Abstract How should the situation change and statutory termination system of civil contracts be referenced and applied to administrative agreements? Taking into account existing regulations and the judicial practices of people’s courts, it can be seen that when there is a fundamental breach of the agreement’s counterparty or it encounters force majeure and situation change, the contracting administrative entity should, in principle, refer to and apply the situation change and statutory termination system of civil contracts.
